data.event: The issue of sister cities surfaced last year when Controller Gord Hume asked for $1,200 to visit Nanjing while on a personal trip to Beijing.

event.title: will get a chance in May

data.event: Londoner will get a chance in May to weigh in on the future of the cit’s board of control.

event.title: will be held at 4 p.m. May 14

data.event: A public participation meeting will be held at 4 p.m. May 14 at Centennial Hall.
